name: planted.bratwurst
description: A herbaceous twist on our classic bratwurst with aromatic herb seasonings.
longDescription: Our planted.bratwurst Herbs adds a fresh, aromatic dimension to the classic sausage. Infused with a blend of herbs, it's perfect for summer grilling, adding to pasta dishes, or enjoying as part of a hearty winter meal. Same great nutritional benefits - 36% more protein and 76% less saturated fat than meat.
ingredients: Water, pea protein, sunflower oil, herbs (parsley, chives, marjoram), pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Grill or pan-fry for 6-8 minutes until golden. Great in salads, with vegetables, or alongside mashed potatoes.
